name: @parametric-svg/parse
description: A JS-based parser for parametric.svg graphics

scripts.browser-test: npm run --silent browser-test:hint && concurrent 'npm run browser-test:watch' 'npm run browser-test:serve' 'npm run browser-test:open'
scripts.browser-test:hint: echo \n'Hold on a sec! We’re serving a freshly-baked bundle of tests at http://localhost:9036 . We’ll dish it up to your browser as soon as it’s ready!'\n
scripts.develop: nodangel --ignore node_modules --ignore coverage --watch ../spec/specs --watch . --ext js,yaml --exec 'npm run --silent test:lite'
scripts.view-coverage: echo 'Generating coverage reports...'; npm run coverage >/dev/null && echo '...done.' && opn ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html >/dev/null

author: Tomek Wiszniewski <t.wiszniewski@gmail.com>
